mapper.update: update terminals a set a.is_return_cs_depots=1,a.updated_at=now() where 1=1 and a.is_return_cs_depots=0 and a.account =#{account}

update terminals a set a.stauts=3,a.updated_at=now(),a.is_return_cs_depots=0, a.agent_id="",a.customer_id="",a.order_id="",a.is_rate_wrong="",a.base_rate="", a.billing_cycles_id="",a.opened_at="",a.top_charge="" where a.serial_num=#{serialNum} and a.is_return_cs_depots=1
update terminals a set a.status=5,a.updated_at=now() where a.account=#{account} and a.is_return_cs_depots=1
mapper.select: select serial_num as serialNum,id from terminals where 1=1 and serial_num=#{serialNum}
select serial_num as serialNum,id from terminals where 1=1 and serial_num=#{serialNum} and is_return_cs_depots=1
